# Hold Animal (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[Animal (Domain)|Animal 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One animal

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D); see text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 296

This spell functions like *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]],* except that it affects an animal instead of a humanoid.
